summary: An ordinance accepting a deed of conveyance from Minnie S. Lane, widow, of Oakland, California, dated July 18, 1908, conveying to the City of Seattle, that part of lots 11 and 12, block 9, Motor Line Addition to the City of Seattle, described as follows: beginning at a point which is 280 feet north and 30 feet east of the stone monument set as the intersection of Evanston Avenue and North 44th Street, and extending thence west along the south line of lot 11, 37.5 feet; thence north along the west line of said lots 11 and 12, 50 feet; thence east along the north line of lot 12, 36.5 feet; thence south 50 feet to the point of beginning.
